short_summary: Canada School of Public Service is looking for a supplier to provide the Blanket Exercise learning tool for federal public servants to understand Indigenous history and culture
description: The supplier must provide the in-person Blanket Exercise half-day workshop and scripts in both official languages. The contractor must provide facilitator training for the in-person Blanket Exercise for up to 20 CSPS participants (minimum of 12 participants required for a session).
